original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Chairman of the Sri Lanka Transport Board' says that their daily income has increased to Rs. 158 million. The chairman said that about 1.2 million passengers travel by buses belonging to the SLTB, daily. He added that the daily income has increased due to the increase in checks within buses concerning tickets and fares.

Indian police arrest three rail staff over Odisha train disaster
